ygData.subject: RE: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: Try it at night - you won t live to reach the other side of the zone.  It is full of high level undead (30 to 45+) and things like enraged dread wolves and
ygData.messageBody:
Try it at night - you won't live to reach the other side of the zone. It is
full of high level undead (30 to 45+) and things like enraged dread wolves
and nearly all of it casts nasty spells and has a huge aggro radius - it's a
BLAST!

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
SCARAB on Solusek Ro

> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Hmm, my run thru Kith was in day time hours. What is in Kith for 30+? I
> thought the Invasion was a one time thing for the PoH debut.
>
> As for faster than anything in Norrath, have you raced Grimfeather lately?
> Granted he's not in Kith but he's faster than my MM drums. Also,
> Shadowmen
> are faster as well - I have heard.
>
> What fun is it if you are not scared? (The whole game I mean.)
>
> Sylly
